file_index.target\\sample_logs\\linux_vm1.txt: The system booted, starting core services and bringing the network online. An 'ubuntu' user logged in successfully via SSH from 192.168.1.100. Subsequently, a root cron job executed and completed.
file_index.target\\sample_logs\\object_storage_clus: The system initially processed successful object PUT/GET requests. Subsequently, an OSD node was reported down, prompting a cluster rebalance and data healing. Healing completed for `config-backup.dat`, and OSD.7 remained operational.
